## R Markdown


```{r cars}
combine<-read.csv("/Users/zx/Desktop/combined.csv")
```



```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
g1<-glm('Last_Financing_Deal_Type ~ State_incorporation+TRADED+five+thirteen+Num_of_name+fame_included', data = combine, family = binomial(link='probit'))
summary(g1)

```


```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
step(g1, test="LRT")
```
